headline: Everest : Alex Haines Joins Everest as Reinsurance Global Head of Engineering
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda - March 25, 2025 - Everest Reinsurance, the reinsurance division of Everest Group, Ltd. , today announced that Alex Haines has been appointed as Global Head of Engineering. He will...
